title: Guys do drag- *flash*
body:
=C

Can we rename it to Wyvern this happens all the time.

replies.body: F is for Flash, man. F is for Flash.

D is for Defense. F is for Offense.
D - Flash. F - Ignite.

> [{quoted}](name=BaconPoroDeluxe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IIT90l4E,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-07-10T20:20:46.853+0000)
>
> D is for Defense. F is for Offense.
> D - Flash. F - Ignite.

Except Flash can be used offensively. {{champion:1}}

That doesn't make sense. What happens if you run flash and heal, or flash and barrier?
(answer: ofc you'd use F for Flash!)
Or you could just not be retarded.
